mapper.insert: insert into member (id, uname, phone, addr, pw) values (#{id},#{uname},#{phone},#{addr},#{pw})
mapper.select: select * from member order by id asc
mapper.update: update member set uname = #{uname}, phone = #{phone}, addr = #{addr} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
